QuestData.Title: Secrets of Highmountain
QuestData.Description: Mayla's father, Ulan, was our last high chieftain. He was slain trying to stop the Underking from seizing the Hammer of Khaz'goroth.$b$bI have watched Mayla all her life and can tell you she has both the courage and the strength to wear the mantle of High Chieftain.$b$bShe needs only our help to realize it herself.$b$bWill you meet us at the city entrance along the southern bluff? There is a ritual that might help, but we will need your aid to survive it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Spiritwalker Ebonhorn at the southern bluff of Thunder Totem.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Spiritwalker Ebonhorn at the southern bluff of Thunder Totem.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, thank you for coming. Mayla is as stubborn as her father if not more so.
